normal.name: Snow Ghost Impact
normal.description: Deals 120% attack power ice damage to enemy unit

auto.name: Ice Snow Healing
auto.description: Heals all friendly units, restoring HP equal to 33.6% + 182 of own attack power

ultimate.name: Ice Seal Protection
ultimate.description: Heals all friendly units, restoring HP equal to 47.2% + 182 of own attack power

passive.name: Frost Blessing
passive.description: Ultimate skill healing can add a 5-second continuous recovery effect to the target, recovering 75% of Snow Girls attack power + 29 HP per second

teamSkill.name: Combination Skill
teamSkill.description: Own attack increased by 10%, healing amount increased by 12.5%

awakenings.effect: After ultimate skill heals friendly units, additionally increases targets damage dealt by 10% for 10 second
Normal attacks deal additional frost damage equal to 50% of own attack power
auto Skill that heal friendly units can also trigger the passives continuous recovery effect

memoryCard.name: The Beauty of Heijing Castle
effects: When the healed targets HP is full, targets damage is increased by 24% for 10 seconds
